name: Remove a product from the cart
scenarioId: login_app:Remove a product from the cart
methodName: Remove a product from the cart

testSteps.description: Given I am logged into SauceDemo with the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart

children.description: User opens the browser at https://www.saucedemo.com/
User adds the product Sauce Labs Backpack
User clicks on add to cart button

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for By.xpath: //div[@class='inventory_item'][.//div[text()='Sauce Labs Backpack']]//button[contains(text(),'Add to cart')] to be present (tried for 5 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

children.description: When I remove the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" from the cart
Then I should not see the product "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart

userStory.narrative:
As a client
  I want to log into SauceDemo
  So I can buy products from the catalog
